name: Second Guessing
description:
This game is probably aegre lite edition. We had very little time working with it.

IF YOU PLAY THE GAME IN THE  BROWSER : FULL SCREEN!!!!

Basicly it is a puzzle game.
The Jam that we made the game for: United GameJam 2020
The Jam's theme was : " Two"

We hope you will like our game :P

If there is enough execitement around the game we will probably extend it in the future.
Stay tuned for that.

Spoiler: if you find a part where you stuck (the first timed level than dont be scared.... it is not a bug!! Try to find a WAY TO GO TROUGH the laser!!!

GameDevs :
-JimDayler (Fakan Bálint)

-Kowaik ( Benedek Kovács)

-TheKosh(Ákos Zsiga)
